item.title: Outside 38-40 Wellington Gardens, 9th October
item.description:
There has been a skip here for weeks and it is now so overloaded that items are falling out on to the pavement and the road. This is dangerous and the skip needs removing.

item.title: Hateful language, 9th October

item.title: Outside Coronation Court - Kenilworth Rd (near junction with Willesden Lane), 9th October
item.description:
Massive dump of building DIY waste previously reported and now marked as ‘no further action.’ Waste remains and has grown. Others have now added general rubbish. The pavement is now completely blocked. How can ‘no further action’ be anppr and what message does this send to other would-be fly-tippers? Please address this urgently - the issue is already out of hand

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kenilworth Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load
